title: Fujiyama
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Be warned that this is a steakhouse and seafood restaurant. That said, the kitchen is willing to accommodate vegan requests. The sushi chef will make a custom vegetable combinations sushi roll by request. The vegetable hibachi dinner entree can be made vegan with the omission of the soup and shrimp and substitute extra veggies. The asparagus roll, cucumber roll, avocado roll, vegetable roll, and sweet potato roll are all reported to be vegan suitable.
